replyContent: Thank you! If you enjoy using the app, please rate us 5 stars. It would encourage us to continue improving the product!

content: Needs a ton more work! The latest version doesn't let you fast forward/rewind. The interface is harder to work with & the app takes up a great amount of unnecessary space with the way it saves its files. The mixer could be more fine tuned & the pitch corrector should be more detailed. A synthesizer plug-in should also be made available.
replyContent: Hello, We are sorry for any frustration this has caused. Your review has been forwarded to our Development Team. We are working on a new release that will fix a lot of issues soon. If you need further assistance, our Support Team is available here: https://www.nch.com.au/support/index.html -NCH Software Team

content: I don't know why this isn't the ONLY recording and editing app people use. Its hands down all you need. I strongly recommend it to anyone interested in making professional recordings.
I just bought the master version. I like the sound quality. Is quite good. But when I record dub the track the timing always cannot synchronise. How to solve this problem?
replyContent: Hi there, you may have hardware latency issues. You can specify an offset in milliseconds in the program which will automatically adjust your recordings. This option is only available if you are using an MME recorder. To set the offset recording you may go to MixPad > Options > General > Audio recording. Thanks -NCH Software Team

content: It's ugly but gets the job done. Really difficult to work with on mobile, surely there's a way to make it look a little sexier. As for the mixing itself, my tracks seem to fight each other for volume dominance, don't know how to fix that.

Hi,
We appreciate you taking the time to send your feedback. Your review has been passed along to our development team. -NCH Software Team

content: This is the optimal go to for mobile. I use Audacity and FL in the studio and this is at least as good for mobile applications. Great for laying layered lyrics once your beats complete  Awesome app for effectiveness and quality! 2 mics up!!

The first MixPad was dope... this one is similar but super improved, polished, re-formatted & refined for quicker smoother operation, AND is much more user friendly. Why this is rated 3.--  is beyond me. Honestly, for what it is, it's not far-off from professional quality software, portably speaking. At home I use Pro Tools for recording music & mixing, which is not easily mobile, sound-booth/equalizers and all, lol; BUT on the road, this recording/mixing app more than surpasses my expectations when we're talking about a quality mobile studio. Love it! Well done NCH!
replyContent:
Hello,
Thank you for the great review! We are happy to hear that you are enjoying using MixPad and recording tracks on the go! 
-NCH Software Team

content: No, that is not a typo...this App has NO EQ, in spite of Nch Software's claim that it does.  Audio software with no facility to tweak the pitch, even at its' most basic level...it beggars belief.
replyContent:
We had to remove the EQ from the current version (3.40) due to unforeseen issues. We apologize for not updating the store listing as well. Our developers are working to have the EQ included in future releases. Thank you for your patience.

-NCH Software
